text: Allan Edwards may refer to: *Allan Edwards (footballer) (born 1957), Australian rules footballer *Allan Edwards (Australian cricketer) (1921–2019), Australian cricketer *Allan Edwards (New Zealand cricketer) (1920–1942), New Zealand cricketer *Allan Roy Edwards (1937–1999), Canadian ice hockey player ==See also== *Alan Edwards (disambiguation) *Allen Edwards (disambiguation) *Al Edwards (disambiguation)
title: Allan Edwards
